duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide procurement operations support for the fulfillment center, including forecasting, inventory management, and supplier management.
Lead and manage a team of non-inventory receivers to ensure the building has adequate resources and is set up for success.
Develop and maintain strong relationships with suppliers and internal customers to understand budgetary targets and develop methods of measuring and defining savings and value metrics.
Measure actual vs planned savings and develop solutions to meet goals.
Identify and implement innovative solutions to provide procurement support to the Operations network.
Coordinate the procurement, demand identification, and inventory management of non-merchandise items required for building operation.
Manage and maintain supplier scorecards and ensure timely resolution of vendor payment issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree, or 2+ years of Amazon (blue badge/FTE) experience
